options.content:
Jenkins

ArgoCD

Keycloak

Prometheus

Istio

Harbor

Nexus

targets.expr: sum by(namespace, pod) (kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running",pod=~".*jenkins.*"}) OR on() vector(-1)
sum by(namespace, pod) (kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running",pod=~".*argocd.*"}) OR on() vector(-1)
sum by(namespace, pod) (kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running",pod=~".*keycloak.*"}) OR on() vector(-1)
sum by(namespace, pod) (kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running",pod=~".*prometheus.*"}) OR on() vector(-1)
sum by(namespace, pod) (kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running",pod=~".*istio.*"}) OR on() vector(-1)
sum by(namespace, pod) (kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running",pod=~".*harbor.*"}) OR on() vector(-1)
sum by(namespace, pod) (kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running",pod=~".*nexus.*"}) OR on() vector(-1)
count(namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload_type=~"$type"}) by (workload, workload_type)
count(namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload_type=~"$type"}) by (workload, workload_type)

sort_desc(sum(rate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{cluster="$cluster",namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
* on (cluster,namespace,pod) group_left ()
    topk by (cluster,namespace,pod) (
      1,
      max by (cluster,namespace,pod) (kube_pod_info{host_network="false"})
    )
* on (cluster,namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster",namespace="$namespace", workload=~".+", workload_type=~"$type"}) by (workload))

(sum(rate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload=~".+", workload_type=~"$type"}) by (workload))

panels.description: Viola Pod 수신 시 발생하는 Packets Dropped

targets.expr:
(sum(rate(container_network_receive_packets_dropped_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload=~".+", workload_type=~"$type"}) by (workload))

panels.title: Rate of Received Packets Dropped

targets.expr:
sort_desc(sum(rate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{cluster="$cluster",namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
* on (cluster,namespace,pod) group_left ()
    topk by (cluster,namespace,pod) (
      1,
      max by (cluster,namespace,pod) (kube_pod_info{host_network="false"})
    )
* on (cluster,namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster",namespace="$namespace", workload=~".+", workload_type=~"$type"}) by (workload))

(sum(rate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload=~".+", workload_type=~"$type"}) by (workload))

panels.description: Viola Pod 송신 시 발생하는 Packets Dropped

targets.expr:
(sum(rate(container_network_transmit_packets_dropped_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload=~".+", workload_type=~"$type"}) by (workload))

panels.title: Rate of Transmitted Packets Dropped

targets.expr:
(sum(rate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload_type=~"$type"}) by (workload))

(sum(rate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload_type=~"$type"}) by (workload))

(sum(rate(container_network_receive_packets_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload_type=~"$type"}) by (workload))

(sum(rate(container_network_transmit_packets_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload_type=~"$type"}) by (workload))

(sum(rate(container_network_receive_packets_dropped_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload_type=~"$type"}) by (workload))

(sum(rate(container_network_transmit_packets_dropped_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload_type=~"$type"}) by (workload))
